dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: With impeccable swiftness… I will render them silent.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: The morning is always quiet. It’s also a surprisingly viable time for assassination due to the lack of passersby.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Is there anything you want to say? I can afford a moment to hear it.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: The moonlight scatters… This is an opportune day for blending into the shade.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: I’m always watching, Manager. Just call when you need something.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Give me my next target. I’ll make quick work of them.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: Heathcliff has been irritating me lately… Though, I can’t deny that he brings serviceable results with him. This note? …It’s nothing to worry about.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
Where I used to be… would things have gone differently if you were there with us?
Could that hell have been… somewhat bearable?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
I favor the color red. A deeper hue bespeaks an unstopping hemorrhage and briskly arriving demise.
…Plus, it’s the color of your head, too.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Executive Manager…? Do you really think you can hide from me?

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: I’ll repay the favor with my performance, now that it’s more reliable and efficient.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: An equal fate to all.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Is that my target? Should be easy.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: You aren’t supposed to visit me in the middle of a mission…

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Unseen by any.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: I’ll render you silent next.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Ah!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Total silence.

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: Huff… You’d have been fine if you stayed hidden.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Wouldn’t even count as a low rank mission.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: I’m sure I told you the likelihood of success for this mission…

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: A predetermined conclusion. What’s my next mission?

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: That was a smooth battle. I was able to see through all the enemy’s weaknesses.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Was I too fast for everyone else to follow?
